detaileddescription.para: nfs_ParseConfLine: parse a line with a settable separator and end of line
parse a line with a settable separator and end of line .

parameterdescription.para: [IN] allocated number of entries in the Argv
[IN] function used to identify a separator
[IN] function used to identify an end of line

detaileddescription.para: nfs_LookupHostAddr: determine host address from string.
This routine is converting a valid host name is both literal or dotted format into a valid netdb structure. If it could not successfull, NULL is returned by the function.
Assumptions: Dotted host address are 4 hex, decimal, or octal numbers in base 256 each separated by a period

parameterdescription.para: [IN] hostname or dotted address, within a string literal.

simplesect.para: the netdb structure related to this client.

detaileddescription.para: nfs_LookupNetworkAddr: determine network address from string.
This routine is converting a valid host name is both literal or dotted format into a valid netdb structure. If it could not successfull, NULL is returned by the function.
Assumptions: Dotted host address are 4 hex, decimal, or octal numbers in base 256 each separated by a period

parameterdescription.para: [IN] hostname or dotted address, within a string literal.

simplesect.para: 0 if successfull, other values show an error

detaileddescription.para: nfs_AddClientsToExportList : Adds a client to an export list
Adds a client to an export list (temporary function ?).
BuildExportEntry : builds an export entry from configutation file. Don't stop immediately on error, continue parsing the file, for listing other errors.

xrefdescription.para: BUGAZOMEU : temporaire, bug de parsing MaxRead/MaxWrite

detaileddescription.para: check for mandatory options

xrefdescription.para: BUGAZOMEU : temporaire, bug de parsing MaxRead/MaxWrite

detaileddescription.para: Grant root access to all clients

ReadExports: Read the export entries from the parsed configuration file.
A negative value on error, the number of export entries else.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned int addr, struct svc_req *ptr_req, exportlist_t *pexport, unsigned int nfs_prog, unsigned int mnt_prog, hash_table_t *ht_ip_stats, nfs_ip_stats_t *ip_stats_pool, exportlist_client_entry_t *pclient_found)
memberdef.name: nfs_export_check_access

detaileddescription.para: nfs_export_check_access: checks if a machine is authorized to access an export entry.
Checks if a machine is authorized to access an export entry.

parameterdescription.para: [IN] pointer to the related RPC request.
[IN] related export entry (if found, NULL otherwise).
[OUT] pointer to client entry found in export list, NULL if nothing was found.

simplesect.para: TRUE if access in granted, FALSE otherwise.

detaileddescription.para: BUGAZOMEU a completer lors de l'integration de RPCSEC_GSS
nfs_export_create_root_entry: create the root entries for the cached entries.
Create the root entries for the cached entries.

parameterdescription.para: [IN] the export list to be parsed
[INOUT] the hash table to be used to the cache inode

simplesect.para: TRUE is successfull, FALSE if something wrong occured.

detaileddescription.para: BuildDefaultExport : builds an export entry for '/' with default parameters.

briefdescription.para: What is needed to parse the exports file.
